item.description:
TabTab 2.0.3 - Speed Improvements, Bug Fixes, Comet and Helium Support üéÉ

  • Added tab tracking support for Comet and Helium browsers.
  • Disabling/enabling tab tracking should work much better now.
  • Improved speed of switching between tabs.
  • Holding down Tab to cycle through tabs now align with system keyboard repeat settings.
  • Mouse activation has been sped up, with a "Insant" option added in settings.
  • Opening TabTab and dismissing it with "Esc" key now refocuses the previous window.
  • Some apps were not being tracked when they were opened, this should be fixed now.

Note: I'm aware that Firefox vertical tab support is broken right now, I'm working on it. Thank you for your patience!


Thank You ‚≠ê

Keep your feedback and bug reports coming! I take time to read every single one.

Since TabTab isn't on the App Store, organic comments on subreddits or social media help a lot. Do consider spreading the word about TabTab if you find it useful ü´∂

Feel free to join our Discord community.
